Parameters: MediaPlayer: the MediaPlayer associated with this callback
TimedText: the timed text sample which contains the text needed to be displayed and the display format.
onTimedText(android.media.MediaPlayer,an.Description: Called to indicate an avaliable timed text
onTimedText(android.media.MediaPlayer,an.FullName: public abstract void onTimedText (MediaPlayer mp, TimedText text)

ClassDesc: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when a timed text is available for display.
